claims.object: the generation of visual representations of observations that utilize spatial relationships, encompassing a range of symbolic representations, from traditional cartographic maps to advanced geospatial visualizations
identifying geographical dependencies within human-environment systems

surface_layer.definition: The generation of visual representations of observations that utilize spatial relationships, encompassing a range of symbolic representations, from traditional cartographic maps to advanced geospatial visualizations.

deep_layer.mechanism: Visualization of spatial data to reveal patterns and relationships.
